sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump is one step closer to getting back in the White House.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: On Tuesday, the former president won the New Hampshire primary in a one-on-one face-off with former South Carolina governor Nikki Haley.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: With this win in New Hampshire and a decisive victory in Iowa last week, Trump has topped the first two contests of the 2024 election cycle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We've won almost every single poll in the last three months against Crooked Joe Biden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Almost every poll.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And she doesn't win those polls.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Haley vowed to remain in the Republican race, saying she'll now focus on the February 24 primary in South Carolina.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: At her election night party, Haley said the GOP race is far from over.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is just the beginning.

sentences.sentence: We've got the rest of the nation.

sentences.sentence: ALI ROGINIUS, Haley's campaign is launching a new four million advertising campaign in South Carolina beginning Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: JOHN YANG, Two victories for Donald Trump, and he marches on toward the Republican Party nomination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: There really is no other headline coming from this primary in New Hampshire other than this one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Nikki Haley, Trump's former U.N. ambassador, is staying in the race and vowing to compete in the next state, South Carolina, in one month's time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: That's a long time, though, in U.S. politics, and there will be constant pressure from Donald Trump's supporters for her to end her campaign.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: That would give the former president the chance to pivot immediately toward a general election rematch with Joe Biden in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: New Hampshire was meant to be Haley's best chance to win a Republican primary, precisely because fewer Republicans vote here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Independent voters, meaning those who are not registered with either of the two big parties, can participate in the Republican primary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: But even this large group of more moderate voters couldn't give Nikki Haley a win.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: She has now called on Donald Trump to debate her, but he will likely refuse.

sentences.sentence: Philip Crowther, Euronews, in Manchester, New Hampshire.
